mapper.select: SELECT EMNUM, NBO, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE, IMPOR FROM ( SELECT EMNUM, NBO, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE, IMPOR , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NBO DESC) AS RNUM FROM BOARDTBL ) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY IMPOR DESC , NBO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDTBL (NBO,EMNUM,TITLE,CONTENT,REGDATE,IMPOR,UPDATEDATE) VALUES( boardtbl_SEQ.nextval, '${emnum}', '${title}', '${content}', TO_DATE('${regdate}', 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), '${impor}', TO_DATE('${updatedate}', 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDTBL SET TITLE = '${title}', CONTENT = '${content}', UPDATEDATE = TO_DATE('${updatedate}', 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), IMPOR = '${impor}' WHERE NBO = '${nbo}'
